RESOURCE.NAME: ANNIE+Measurements
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Ready-made application for ANNIE plus the measurement tagger

RESOURCE.NAME: Measurement Tagger
RESOURCE.COMMENT: A measurement tagger based upon GNU Units

PARAMETER.NAME: locale
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The locale to use for normalizing measurement values

PARAMETER.NAME: encoding
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The encoding used for all the configuration files

PARAMETER.NAME: ignoredAnnotations
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Annotations in which a measurement cannot occur

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The name for annotation set used as input to the tagger

PARAMETER.NAME: outputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The name for annotation set used for the generated annotations

PARAMETER.NAME: failOnMissingInputAnnotations
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Throw an exception when there are none of the required input annotations (Token) are present in the input set

PARAMETER.NAME: consumeNumberAnnotations
PARAMETER.COMMENT: If true then Number annotations representing a measurement value will be consumed

PARAMETER.NAME: commonURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: A file of common words that should not be treated as units unless they are part of a compound unit

PARAMETER.NAME: japeURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The JAPE file that drives the tagging process

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process
